ValidationRule.description: Effective To (if populated) should be greater than the Effective From
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISBLANK( loan__Rate_Effective_To__c ) ) , loan__Rate_Effective_To__c < loan__Rate_Effective_From__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Effective To date should be equal to or greater than the Effective From date.
